Thank you very much. The president, the second vice president, the chief physician, all good days.

Well, today, because of the pandema, we'll talk about the sizes of the Araba, Biscaia, and the muscles and autonomists. Today, we speak again of royal decrees, if either this Chamber or this Government have not participated in the consent of this decree, either in the design or in the consent of this decree. And to-day we shall speak of certain measures, those in a royal decree. And the Jeld Party of the Eucta was not agreed on the mode of making a decree either of the content or of the royal decree, which you may know. And today, again, we're going to talk about the company that's nothing but the Administration management, we all know.

The conditions decided by the Central Government, as endorsed by the Congress of the Deputies of the Royal Decree 5/2021, we thought and said, that they could not be efficient, that they could not be effective, since we understood that they could over-constrict the typology of potential beneficiaries of the aid and that they could not take into account the reality of the economic fabric of our Autonomous Community.

Some figures have already been given here. The result of the aid programme, at least so far, is not being desirable. It is true that it will be a lower number of applications than expected, and therefore a logically lower level of implementation than we would like. And that's why they have been studied and made changes from the central government that have been transferred (?) the legal order of this community.

It has already been said that a new deadline is being opened today following the latest amendment extending the time limit for applications to increase the period of computable debt, as well as accounting losses. We believe that this new deadline for applications has been opened today and will increase the number of such applications, and obviously, as a result, the amounts granted.

How much money, because at the moment I personally do not know it and out of prudence I do not see you able to venture a figure of what is going to be the final amount of such aid, which is going to be directly related to the number of applications that are submitted. We want it to be the highest possible execution, because that will mean that more funds have reached our economic fabric.

We and we called for other amendments to the decree that would have made it possible to expand the number of self-employed and self-employed beneficiaries, but the reality is that what has been approved has been approved and that is what the Department of Economics and Finance, which I remind you is manager, is not a designer of this aid programme.

Well, it wasn't possible today to get a transaction deal, the way we got it on the 27th of May last May. And what we're supposed to say is, you're just saying, "You're making a big deal." new activities have been introduced, public resources have been established, the bureau has invested the necessary human resources, and the administrative resources have been facilitated as much as possible. And the Basque Country, Mr. Irart, has said so recently from this tribe.

And we have reached an agreement fundamentally for the request that is made in this case from the groups that have sex to create a new line with resources... aid from the Basque Government's own resources to meet the needs of those sectors which have not been able to benefit from the aid contained in Royal Decree 5/2021 and the successive amendments which have been made.

By the way, a few days ago this issue was re-discussed in the Congress of Deputies and as far as I know, no group has said anything...

... They've been happening. By the way, a few days ago this issue was re-discussed in the Congress of Deputies, and, as far as I know, no group has said anything.

Certainly, the legislative mechanism, the vehicle chosen by the central executive to amend Royal Decree 5/2021, because in our view it was not the best one to provoke that debate, it was not. An additional provision in the Royal Decree Law that had nothing to do with what we discussed today. But the truth is, no group has said anything. And some, even, did not say anything when the first Royal Decree Law we are talking about was debated in Congress.

We talked about the lack of Madrid, Mr. Irart, but you didn't say anything there. In the first discussion, EAJ will say so about the theft. And your team on this debate didn't participate in that discussion. "Es más, alguno de sus diputdos votó a favor; no sé si por error o para el 177 que hacía."

Proposamenera itzuliz, erdibidekora, well, erdibidekoa egin duen taldeak zein zuzenketak egin dabezan taldeek ildo edo programa berri bat sortzeko eskatzen dotsie Eusko Jaurlaritzari. Ñabardura batzuekin, éta ez dodaz orina ñabardura oriek baloratuk. Eta has lost an artean gure score. In our view, it is not feasible to articulate a new decree that can be resolved before 31 December, nor is it appropriate to provide it with funds that, in any case, are intended to support another call that is still open today.

Someone could say, and in fact, well, I think it has dropped in the first interventions, that if there is no material time, then change the conditions. For example, extend the call beyond 31 December. But what is happening is that today the date of 31 December is immutable; not because this Parliament says so, not because this government wants it, 31 December is set by the Community temporary framework and the State temporary framework as the deadline for such aid. A special temporary framework for state aid, in this case, intended to support the economy in the context of COVID-19.

If this time frame does not vary, and today it seems that it will not change, the rules for the design of aid, subsidies by states and autonomous communities lose the legal umbrella under which they could be granted. And back to the pre-pandemic situation. They re-activate the previous state aid rules, re-activate market protection measures, and therefore cease to operate the derogation contained in Article 107 of the Treaty on Union, which has enabled such decisions to be taken and such aid programmes to be designed.

To this day, what we know is that the umbrella regime disappears on December 31, 2021. Within, counting on today, 49 working days. And from 1 January 2022, if no other decision is taken by the Commission, it is also normal in this respect. And from that date on, if that umbrella is not extended, it is very likely that everyone – they will allow me the expression – will have to reset. Because the current aid policy, which has so far been positive and essential for the sectors of our economy most affected by the effects of COVID-19, will have to adopt different formulas, other formulas and lines so far used. We have to communicate again to Brussels, Brussels has to accept again, and so on. We return to the situation, to the pre-pandemic legal framework. I insist, if you don't change that time frame.

If there are changes in the time frame decided by the Community, by the Commission, and if there are changes in the State time frame, we could be talking about other issues. But today the top is December 31, 2021.

We hope that a new time of demand obtained under cover of the motion of the King, well, better results than they have hitherto obtained. And that's the line that goes with the Socialist Group's correction. In that place, I'm asking you to come to the latest changes made by the Royal Law as quickly as possible. And that's how it's done.

Thank you.
text:
Legebiltzarburu andrea, eskerrik asko. Lehendakaria, bigarren lehendakariordea, sailburua, egun on guztioi.

Bueno, gaur, berriro, pandemiaren ondorioz Araba, Bizkaia eta Gipuzkoako enpresei eta autonomoei laguntzeko neurriei buruz berba egingo dugu. Gaur, berriro berba egiten dugu errege dekretuez, Ganbera honek edo gobernu honek ez badute parte hartu, ez diseinuan ez onarpenean, dekretu honen onarpenean. Eta gaur, berriro, hitz egingo dugu neurri batzuei buruz, errege dekretu batean daudenak. Eta ez da ados egon, ez edukiarekin ez errege dekretua egiteko moduarekin; hori jakiten duzue. Eta gaur, berriz ere, Eusko Jaurlaritzari Administrazio kudeaketa baino ez dagokion laguntzei buruz berba egingo dugu, denok dakigu lez.

Las condiciones decididas por el Gobierno central refrendadas por el Congreso de los Diputados del Real Decreto 5/2021, pensamos y así lo dijimos, que podían no ser eficientes, que podían no ser eficaces, dado que entendíamos que podían constreñir en exceso la tipología de posibles beneficiarios de las ayudas y que podían no tener en cuenta la realidad del tejido económico de nuestra Comunidad Autónoma.

Se han dado ya aquí algunas cifras. El resultado del programa de ayudas, por lo menos hasta ahora, no está siendo el deseable. Es cierto que será un número de solicitudes inferior a lo esperado, y por lo tanto, un nivel de ejecución lógicamente inferior a la que nos gustaría. Y por eso se han estudiado y se han ido dando cambios desde el Gobierno central que han sido trasladados (?) al ordenamiento legal de esta comunidad.

Se ha dicho ya, hoy mismo se abre un nuevo plazo tras la última modificación en el que se amplía el plazo de solicitudes para aumentar el periodo de deuda computable, así como las pérdidas contables. Estimamos que este nuevo plazo de solicitudes se ha abierto hoy y hará que crezca el número de dichas solicitudes, y evidentemente, como consecuencia de ello, las cuantías concedidas.

Hasta qué cuantía, pues en estos momentos yo personalmente lo desconozco y por prudencia no le veo capacitado para aventurarles una cifra de cuál va a ser el monto final de esas ayudas, que va a estar directamente relacionado con el número de solicitudes que se presenten. Deseamos que sea la ejecución la más alta posible, porque eso querrá decir que más fondos han llegado a nuestro tejido económico.

Nosotros y nosotras abogábamos por introducir otras modificaciones en el decreto que hubieran hecho posible ampliar el número de empresas y personas autónomas beneficiarias, pero la realidad es que se ha aprobado lo que se ha aprobado y a eso ha de atenerse el Departamento de Economía y Hacienda, que le recuerdo es gestor, no diseñador de este programa de ayudas.

Bueno, gaur ez da posible izan transakzio akordio bat lortzea, joan den maiatzaren 27an lortu genuen bezalakoa. Eta, esan behar duguna da, ba Jaurlaritza akordio hori betetzen ari dela: jarduera berriak sartu dira, baliabide propioak jarri dira, Sailak beharrezko giza baliabideak jarri ditu eta Administrazio izapideak ahalik eta gehien erraztu dira. Eta, k, Iriarte jaunak, ba horrela esan du tribuna honetatik orain dela gutxi.

Y hemos alcanzado un acuerdo fundamentalmente por la petición que se hace en este caso desde los grupos que han transado de crear una nueva línea con recursos… de ayudas con recursos propios del Gobierno Vasco, que venga a atender las necesidades de aquellos sectores que no han podido beneficiarse de las ayudas contenidas en el Real Decreto 5/2021 y en las sucesivas modificaciones que se han ido produciendo.

Por cierto, hace unos días esta cuestión se ha vuelto a debatir en el Congreso de los Diputados y que yo sepa ningún grupo ha dicho nada…

… se han ido produciendo. Por cierto, hace unos días esta cuestión se ha vuelto a debatir en el Congreso de los Diputados, y, que yo sepa, ningún grupo ha dicho nada.

Ciertamente, el mecanismo legislativo, el vehículo elegido por el Ejecutivo central para modificar el Real Decreto 5/2021, pues en nuestra opinión, no era el mejor para suscitar ese debate, no lo era. Una disposición adicional en el Real Decreto Ley que nada tenía que ver con lo que debatimos hoy. Pero lo cierto es que ningún grupo ha dicho nada. Y algunos, incluso, no dijeron nada cuando se debatió en el Congreso el primer Real Decreto Ley sobre el que estamos hablando.

Madrilen gaitasun faltari buruz berba egin da, Iriarte jauna, baina han ez duzue ezer esan. Lehenengo eztabaidan EAJk bai esan eban. Eta zure taldeak debate honetan, eztabaida horretan ez zuen parte hartu. Es más, alguno de sus diputados votó a favor; no sé si por error o para ser el 177 que hacía falta.

Proposamenera itzuliz, erdibidekora, bueno, erdibidekoa egin duen taldeak zein zuzenketak egin dabezan taldeek ildo edo programa berri bat sortzeko eskatzen dotsie Eusko Jaurlaritzari. Ñabardura batzuekin, eta ez dodaz orain ñabardura horiek baloratuko. Eta hau desadostasun puntua da gure artean. En nuestra opinión, no vemos factible articular un nuevo decreto que pueda ser resuelto antes del 31 de diciembre, y tampoco vemos adecuado dotarlo con unos fondos que, en todo caso, están pensados para apoyar otra convocatoria que a día de hoy sigue abierta.

Alguien podría decir, y de hecho, bueno, yo creo que se ha dejado caer en las primeras intervenciones, que si no hay tiempo material, pues que cambien las condiciones. Por ejemplo, ampliar la convocatoria más allá del 31 de diciembre. Pero lo que ocurre es que, a día de hoy, la fecha del 31 de diciembre es inamovible; no porque lo diga este Parlamento, no porque lo quiera este Gobierno, el día 31 de diciembre está establecido por el marco temporal comunitario y el marco temporal estatal como la fecha tope para ayudas de este tipo. Un marco temporal especial para ayudas de estado, en este caso, destinadas a respaldar la economía en el contexto del COVID-19.

Si este marco temporal no varía, y a día de hoy parece que no va a variar, las reglas para el diseño de ayudas, de subvenciones por parte de estados y comunidades autónomas pierden el paraguas legal bajo el que han podido ser concedidas. Y volvemos a la situación anterior a la pandemia. Vuelven a operar las normativas anteriores en materia de ayudas de estado, vuelven a operar las medidas de protección del mercado, y deja, por lo tanto, de operar la excepción contenida en el artículo 107 del Tratado de la Unión, que es la que ha posibilitado que se tomen este tipo de decisiones y que se diseñen este tipo de programas de ayudas.

A día de hoy, lo que sabemos es que el régimen paraguas desaparece el 31 de diciembre de 2021. Dentro de, contando con el día de hoy, 49 días hábiles. Y a partir del 1 de enero de 2022, si no se adopta otra decisión por parte de la Comisión, se vuelve a la normalidad también en este aspecto. Y a partir de esa fecha, si no se prorroga ese paraguas, es muy probable que todos y todas –me van a permitir la expresión– tengamos que resetearnos. Porque la actual política de ayudas, que hasta ahora ha sido positiva e imprescindible para los sectores de nuestra economía más afectados por los efectos de la COVID-19, deberán adoptar fórmulas, otras fórmulas y líneas diferentes hasta las ahora empleadas. Volvemos a tener que comunicar a Bruselas, Bruselas tiene que volver a aceptar, etcétera. Volvemos a la situación, al marco jurídico anterior a la pandemia. Insisto, si no se cambia ese marco temporal.

Si hay cambios en el marco temporal decidido por la Comunidad, por la Comisión, y si hay cambios en el marco temporal estatal, pues podríamos estar hablando de otras cuestiones. Pero a día de hoy el tope es 31 de diciembre de 2021.

Espero dugu Errege Dekretuaren aldaketaren babesean irekitako eskaera epe berria, bueno, orain arte lortutakoa baino emaitza hobeak lortzea. Eta ildo horretatik doa Talde Sozialistarekin batera aurkeztutako zuzenketa. Bertan, Eusko Jaurlaritzari eskatzen dotsagu deialdiaren baldintzak Errege Lege Dekretuaren egindako azken aldaketetara lehenbailehen egokitzea. Eta holan egin da ja.

Eskerrik asko.

text_en:
Mrs. President, ladies and gentlemen of the legislature, members of the government, good afternoons again.

Mr. Egibar, we're not a patriot on the left, we're meeting the Basque Country. I told you four years ago. And here, the only one who removed PNV's government was that the patriotic left-handed "precisamente" was his present consideration. From that point on, you can do all the other readings. And the Basque People seem to want no deal with them, because of your tone, that's you, and I'm telling you that. You've committed an opposition to the position. And that shows a weakness, Mr. Egibar.

Look, I've introduced this nomination of my own if you've used it with such a blow as that for the political responsibility. And I see this political concern from two points of view. For the sake of our euscript results, because it seems to me that it cannot be compared with the other groups which are sitting here in opposition, and consequently because it seems to me that the Basque Country is represented by the Union as an alternative in this country. And because I think it's indispensable, and you're not there, maybe you agree, but you'll get other policies started. Maybe we don't agree with these politics, maybe you will see that just the same thing as èbPNV does. I can understand that from our point of view, but from my point of view, these social policies, these employment policies, the strategic needs of our industry, which I have spoken of well, need answers. And in my opinion and in my opinion, they need other answers. And that's why I proposed my nomination.

And we're willing to make popular demands, no doubt. And when I say popular traditions, Mr. Egibar, it's the agreement that won't leave anybody behind. I have asked a question here, in the morning session, and what we have learned from the previous crisis, and one of the things we've learned from the previous crisis has been several people, many people, the most vulnerable people, on one side, have stayed apart because of these crisis. And it seems to me, as society, that we have no one, or as few men as we can, to prevent it; otherwise it will be for us to have the qualities of poverty, and to have so many other pointers, which are not the best, because we have much better, much better. And for that purpose, the Jelt Party of the Eukians can put on the table a pattern, and we put another pattern on it.

I don't despise your example, I say what's lacking, what I don't like, why I don't like, but don't despise the example that the Basque People put on the table. And if it's an agreement for this or the improvement of Hosamism, the Basque Country will be there. No doubt... But these popular agreements are not only an agreement.

And I'll tell you more: the agreement does not mean a thing which your party often believes, and is conciliatory. And it's self-control that is often brought to the table by the Jelt Party. And if we want settlements, and if we want co-ordination and cooperation in this new phase, and if we believe that the agreements taken between all of them will have a much greater influence over this society, and that the public will receive them democraticly much better, we must know that, as I have known in other cases, each of us must leave something with it. But what is not possible is to say, "This is what it is and this is what we must remember."

And I'm telling you for my sake, because I collected the Basque Country and I've been to the Basque Country while I'm in the Union, but I'm also telling you that when I've been interviewing so many operators all this time, it says that the Government communicates it, but because it doesn't give him a chance to cooperate. I don't know if they all lie, that's what they all mean, they're all from the Basque Country... I don't think so, I don't think so.

And all this requires something very important to me, and is another model of government. And in this model of government, at the present day, when they have so many quotations to Europe, I think that even the kings of the Government ought to change it. And you said we didn't want any deal. That's not true. And if you think that the Government is what you have said, that the proposals made to convey to or to frame, are those which we have made in the pandemonies, tell me why, Mr. Egibar, have been the foundation of our election-pain, our commitments, and today, as far as we have been able to share in this government from the first moment.

I will tell you more, and for the quotations you have made about health: When there was not yet one case of COVID-19 in the Araba, Biscaia, and Gipuzia, we asked the Government when there was not yet a single case, and when there was not yet one case, I called Mrs. Merene Murga, and asked her what was the situation, what was the situation, what was the matter with Fordan and Italy. And I told him our hand was stretched out to help.

It's more than the attitude they've made, and the protocol they've made, and the fact that the Basque Country isn't in agreement with. But it's not just the Basque People collecting, is it? Ask your first attention doctors what's going on, and ask some other collectives. So take things in size, see how things can be done; see how we can structure the cooperation, and see what each of us will put on one side of this cooperation, what we can leave in a corner, and how we will do this co-operation.

And bargains, Mr. Egibar, are possible, it's possible that the Basque Country should be assembled. Me and you worked a lot, and we worked together in the Autogobernu Poncia agreement. And we made a deal. And you said very little today about this deal. But in the former law it was the greatest agreement ever made in this chamber by such a proposal. And now, considering the results of the Jeltza Party and the Basque People, I will tell you that this agreement is still more protective. And that this agreement is received by a new political State, receiving another relation to the State of Spain, that it receives a sure system, and that it receives the right of deciding, and the right of questioning the people. He gets all that. And if we are told several times here that it is not important, it is necessary, as you well know, that you deceive us in order to put in truth all the public policies that we ought to put in force; otherwise we cannot put them. That's essential.

And when I say revolt, it's because you've refused to talk about it. Then you'll say more, but we have a deal, a big deal, a big deal. It is otherwise what other men have produced, what other sects have produced; and others who tell us of what they have done, whether it be accepted or refused by the Jestric Party, have very clearly mentioned all that.

I have introduced my nomination, Mr. Egibar, ladies and gentlemen of the Hultzian Party of Eukaldo and all the members of the Chamber, because it seems to me that we are the alternative of this people, to do more things in this country in a different manner, and that more and more, it is gathering together, the Basque Country, but also to a national independent project. And they're witnessing it, both in the North Basque Country and even in Nafarro. And I think... And the word I have spoken I shall again bring back the transition;

That's why I've run my nomination because I feel there's a lot of... When I say so from the rhubarese, not radically and running for two days, I have therefore repeated the word transition which must be changed from the root. And we've got to change the steps that we're going to take in the most urgent transition, and we've got to change the steps we have to take in feminism... There is no doubt, when I say all this, first, at a point of view which I have said a thousand times in this pandemy: and to give an answer to the measures which we ought to take as a people strategicly as a common people, in order to approve and correct our answers.

And therefore I have said that this people has learned to rise and advance in very difficult times, and in very difficult situations, which has generally been a collective force. And the Basque People will be in that collective force. Not only in the collective force of parties, but also in the collective force of other motives. And in this sense it seems to me that not only to make a special effort with the majority of the unions, but to attract them in some way or another, or not to work with the association of this people, that it is a fault, and that things are beginning to change in Europe in this sense, and that we must find ways of working in another way.

If the citizens are in the center, if we are to answer the wants of the people, if we are to overcome the commercial deficiencies of Osa, if we are to overcome the care of education, we have propositions, we have our proposals, and we shall be in the bargain. If the deal is a core, then maybe we won't be. But I will try, and our party will try to make it useful to this country, to be beyond the headline, in these agreements. I don't know everything I've told you, or I'll tell you later.

Mrs. Hatch, I've been struck by a couple of things. You said to protect the candidate... That you will not protect "poque no integruó a las hürsdas vascas." Well, maybe you'll have to tell Mrs. Mountain why she doesn't want to integrate "entre las hürscas." Because, well, I'm here to make deals. The same thing I've said to Mr. Egibar, e, agreements must be, not because they're left, or whatever they are, must be based on content.

And then I'd tell you, too, that "integr las hunquierdas vascas" surprised me a little... You will explain to me the first step Podemos has taken in this parliament as soon as the law began. And if that's explained, maybe things will make things clearer to us.

"And the pact with the PSE, it's more of the same." Man, don't forget you're in the government of Spain, Mrs. Gorrotxategi. They are in the Government of Spain, and together with the Basque Nationalist Party in Nafarroa.

In any case, Madam, considering the things you have said, I think there is a great deal of harmony and agreement between us, both with you and the Social Party, and I do not at all avoid doing the same with the rest of the rest of the party. But I repeat: it will always be based on content, apart from content, because it is of no use at all, and is generally frustrating. Frustration in us, for the new agreements we can make in the future in us, and frustration is the most important thing in the people. And that's something I think it's inevitable.

From the left, and from the people, I'd ask you to keep that view on the left side, wouldn't I? And even more from a part of the world that thinks himself a plurination. Rights, madam, cannot be divided. And there will be great difficulties in the execution of so many measures which you have brought here today, and which I have brought to the present day, that if these rights are divided, and we are to ask Spain for leave. but especially that we must endeavour to make this people a different state.

And I'll tell you and Mr. Egibar and all the other members of the Chamber. I think that in this sense we, who make the proclamation of an independent Euskal Republic, proposed this plan of sovereignty from our autonomy, Mr. Egibar, made a few settlements on this plan, and made a sort of settlement. But there are things in the root to be another relationship with the State of Spain, if it's true that we want to look after the men and women of this country. For we may say the other too, but we lack tools, and we must often beg often. And what we propose is a compact, which has all these conditions, and will give them the word and the decision of the people.

The mountain, you told me to look at the opposition, you too, look at the left groups, and you'll see that there are other possibilities, but you've made a definite choice, and it's very legitimate, isn't it? But I'd like to tell you that the left hand is very plural, that we were here, and that there wasn't a single moment before the election campaign, after the election campaign, after the election campaign, and I'd say to Mr. Egibar, who wants so much agreement, that we weren't even called by election love, the only interlocutors have been representatives of the Socialist Party. And you had the possibility of doing other things yourself.

Gobernu indartsu bat exacteten duzu; I hope I have to pray to her izango. Ze sarri askotan aurretik ikusi izan ditugu bi Gobernu hemen, éta ez Gobernu bakar bat. Eta oran Diozu Gobernu indartsu bat izango from her and it's time to walk. Well, all right, Mrs. Mendia, but I've been on the run for a while. That I believe that being in politics and getting into politics, you know very well that it means stepping down from day one. I believe that all the people of this country, those who work in different aspects, are all thrown, now in the time of COVID and always, when they professionally carry out a task too – with the exceptions known, age abar, age abar. But, of course, we are, and if you want to know how I am, you can see that I am.

And in making deals, on those terms that I have said to make deals, Mrs. Mountain. For, as I have said, words are words, but we need content under these words; and the contents may be in one direction, which you know very well, or in another direction. And your Party Socialist

What I repeat is that we shall not leave anyone behind us, and by making a definite passage, but you have told me that I have no road page. And I think that you've said more, well, because today it would have been time to say that, because I think I've put a bright piece of road here on the table, some people have forgotten I've talked about industry, others have forgotten-perhaps they don't like some people, but I think that I've mentioned a clear page and I've already mentioned the means to get this piece of paper out of the way, because I'm so convinced that Mr. Egibar must be, and I think that you know that. And I have brought them on the table-in the meantime, we may now use some kind of financial measures and some others which may be upon the future. To do so, Mrs. Mountain will tell you that there are words to be fulfilled. And it's not possible to say, yes, legally... We shall derogate the law of the Reformation, and then say no a few hours later and say yes and say whatever... It's important that the agreements taken and the agreements that are made, and that I should think that thousands of men and thousands of women in this country and the thousand women of the Spanish State have insisted on this reform, because after you've said it before, you said no.

Well, because you've made it clear that you're not going to do it. You're not going to work for the Basque Republic. I was not surprised, I was not surprised; I was not at all surprised to say so. I'll work for an independent Basque Republic. All I ask is that everyone here, all the people who live here, should have the equality of choice to determine our future. And I think that's a fundamental principle in a healthy democracy. And, further, it seems to me that democracy is not a moment; it is not a thing that comes into being at a moment. And I'm not going to start talking about how the Spanish got in and the jar's on, and the little can of yours. But it seems to me that democracy is not a moment to act as a democracy. And that in this case democracy ought to know how to grow and how to answer what the people at the moment require.

And I think that's a very acceptable democratic principle. And it's a very acceptable one, and also highly accepted in our European countries. Scotland questioned, made a referendum, asked, asked again, and announced. And the next day, I don't know if the sun came out, because it's a bit rainy, but nothing happened, and nothing happened. And so the inhabitants of the country felt, no doubt, that their words and their decisions were of some value, because in that sense I think democracy must be modified by the protagonism which the citizens possess, and the protagonism they have in society. We can't go on like we did in the last centuries.

As I say to you, I want to bring changes from the root, not radically, to this country, because it seems to me that they are necessary and that they must be put to practice. And I've made a first drawing of what was important and I'm not going to repeat it to you again.

I want to talk about my family. My family is the family of thousands and thousands of men fighting against the xenophobia in this world. My family is the family of the Basque Country and the family of thousands of men who have fought and fought against fascism in this world.

Therefore, on our grandmothers, on our nobility, on our mothers and fathers, on our account and on our children, I wish to repeat that this is my family. And that ours is freedom. (Applause)

Thank you, Mrs. Irart. In reply, Mr. Urkullu Renteria has the word, Mr. President, whenever you like.
text:
Lehendakari andrea, legebiltzarkide jaun-andreok, jarduneko Gobernuko kideok, arratsalde on, berriro ere.

Egibar jauna, ez gara ezker abertzalea; gara. Duela lau urte ere esan nizun. Eta, hemen, PNVri gobernua kendu dion bakarra, "precisamente" ezker abertzalea ilegalizatuta zegoela, zuen egungo sozioa izan zen. Hortik aurrera, gainerako irakurketa guztiak egin ditzakezu. Eta badirudi rekin akordiorik nahi ez duena, zure tonuagatik, zu zeu zarela; argi eta garbi esaten dizut hori ere. Oposizioaren oposizioa egin duzu. Eta, horrek ahulezia bat ere erakusten du, Egibar jauna.

Begira, nik nire hautagaitza hau aurkeztu dut –zuk hainbesteko desprezioarekin erabili baldin baduzu ere– ardura politikoagatik. Eta ardura politiko hori bi ikuspuntutatik ikusten dut nik. Batetik, izan ditugun emaitza elektoralengatik, iruditzen zaidalako ezin daitekeela alderatu hemen oposizioan eserita dauden beste taldeekin, eta iruditzen zaidalako, ondorioz, k bai ordezkatzen duela herri honetan alternatiba bat. Eta iruditzen zaidalako ezinbestekoa dela, eta hor zu ez zara; agian, ados egongo, baina beste politika batzuk martxan jartzea. Ez gara ados egongo, agian, politika horietan, agian zuk ikusiko duzu –PNVk egiten dituen bezala– egokiak direla. Nik ulertu dezaket hori, baina gure ikuspuntutik eta nire ikuspuntutik, une honetan politika sozial horiek, enplegu-politika horiek, oso ongi aipatu dudan krisi industrialaren ondorioz daukagun industriaren behar estrategikoek, erantzunak behar dituzte. Eta, nire ustez eta nire taldearen ustez, beste erantzun batzuk behar dituzte. Eta horregatik aurkeztu dut nire hautagaitza.

Eta herri-akordioak egiteko prest gaude, dudarik ez dela. Eta herri-akordioak esaten dudanean, Egibar jauna, dira inor bazterrean utziko ez duten akordioak. Ze galdera bat egin dut, gaur hemen ere, goizeko saioan, eta da zer ikasi dugun aurreko krisietatik, eta aurreko krisietatik ikasi dugun gauzetariko bat izan da zenbait pertsona, pertsona asko, pertsonarik zaurgarrienak, albo batera, alde batera, geratu izan direla, krisi horien ondorioz. Eta iruditzen zait gizarte bezala obligazioa daukagula pertsona bakar bat ere ez, edo ahalik eta pertsona gutxienak, bazter utzita aurre egiteko; bestela, gertatuko zaigulako orain dauzkagun pobrezia datuak edukitzea eta beste hainbat erakusle izatea, ez direnak hoberenak, badaukagulako zer hobetu, asko hobetu. Eta, horretarako, k jarri dezake mahai gainean eredu bat, eta guk jartzen dugu gainean beste eredu bat.

Nik ez dut mespretxatzen zure eredua; esaten dut zer gabezia dituen, zer gauza ez zaizkidan gustatzen, zertan ez natorren bat, baina ez mespretxatu zuk k mahai gainean jartzen duen eredu hori. Eta herri-akordio horiek egiteko eta herri-akordio horietan , zalantzarik gabe –izan ezazu argi–, ba, kalitateko enplegua edo prekaritatearen aurkako akordioa edo feminismoaren aldeko akordioa edo Osakidetza hobetzeko akordioa baldin bada, hor egongo dela. Zalantzarik ez… Baina herri-akordio horiek ez dira bakarrik akordio

Eta are gehiago esango dizut: akordioak ez du esan nahi zure alderdiak sarri askotan uste izaten duen gauza bat, eta da atxikipena. Eta atxikipena da askotan k mahai gainera ekartzen duena. Eta akordioak nahi badira eta fase berri honetan koordinazioa eta kooperazioa nahi baldin baditugu, eta, "efektibamente", denon artean hartutako akordioek uste baldin badugu izango dutela askoz ere eragin handiagoa gizarte honetan, eta demokratikoki askoz ere hobeto jasoko dituela jendarteak, jakin beharko dugu denok –nik beste kasu batzuetan jakin ahal izan dudan bezala– bakoitzak utzi beharko duela zerbait aldean. Baina ez dena posible da esatea "hau da dagoena eta hau da akordatu behar duguna".

Eta esaten dizut niregatik, gatik eta nik neronek n nagoen bitartean izan dudan esperientziagatik, baina esaten dizut baita ere denbora honetan guztian hainbat eragilerekin elkarrizketatu naizenean, esaten duela Gobernuak egiten duela komunikatu, baina ez duelako kooperaziorako aukerarik ematen. Ez dakit den-den-denak gezurra esaten duten, den-den-denek hori esan nahi duten, den-den-denak koak diren… Ez dut uste; ez dut uste hori horrela denik.

Eta horrek guztiak eskatzen du niretzat oso inportantea den beste gauza bat, eta da beste gobernantza-eredu bat. Eta gobernantza-eredu horretan, gaur egun –eta, gaur egun, Europara begira hainbeste aipu egin diren honetan– uste dut gobernantza-ereduek ere aldatu egin behar dutela. Eta zuk esan duzu guk ez dugula akordioetarako inolako nahirik. Hori ez da egia. Eta iruditzen baldin bazaizu Gobernua –nola esan duzu?– limatzeko edo zeratzeko egindako proposamenak direla pandemiaren zehar egin ditugunak, esplikatu egidazu zergatik uste duzun hori hain argi, Egibar jauna, kontuan izanda izan direla, hain zuzen ere, gure hauteskunde-kanpainaren oinarriak, gure konpromisoak eta gaur, besteak beste, hona ekarri ditugun gaiak, eta konpartitu ditugunak lehen-lehen momentutik Gobernu honekin.

Are gehiago esango dizut, eta osasunaren inguruan egin dituzun aipuengatik: oraindik ere COVID-19 kasu bakar bat ez zegoenean Araba, Bizkaia eta Gipuzkoan, oraindik ere kasu bat bakarra ez zegoenean, galdera egin genion Gobernuari; oraindik ere kasu bat bakarra ez zegoenean, neronek deitu nion Nekane Murga andreari, eta galdetu nion zertan zen egoera, zein zen egoera, zer gertatzen zen Forondan-eta Italiatik zetozenekin. Eta esan nion, gainera, gure eskua luzatuta zegoela laguntzeko.

Besterik da gero egin diren jarrera eta egin diren protokolo eta egin diren bide batzuetan ados ez egotea. Baina ez da bakarrik, e?; galdeiezu lehen arretako medikuei zer gertatzen zaien eta galdeiezu beste zenbait kolektibori. Beraz, hartu gauzak tamainan; ikusi gauzak nola egin daitezkeen; ikusi kooperazioa nola egituratu dezakegun, eta ikusi kooperazio horretarako bakoitzak zer jarriko duen alde batean, zer utzi dezake bazter batean eta nola egingo dugun kooperazio hori.

Eta akordioak, Egibar jauna, posible dira; posible dira rekin. Nerea Kortajarenak hainbat aipatu ditu, eta zuk eta biok asko landu genuen, eta elkarrekin landu ere, Autogobernu Ponentziaren akordioan. Eta akordio bat erdietsi genuen. Eta gauza gutxi esan duzu gaur akordio horren inguruan. Baina izan zen aurreko legealdian Ganbera honetan sekula era horretako proposamen batek lortu duen akordio handiena. Eta, orain, ren eta ren emaitzak kontuan izanik, oraindik ere akordio horrek babes handiagoa duela esango dizut. Eta, hain zuzen ere, akordio horrek jasotzen duela estatus politiko berri bat, jasotzen duela beste harreman bat Espainiako Estatuarekin, jasotzen duela berme-sistema bat, eta jasotzen duela erabakitzeko eskubidea eta jendea galdetua izateko eskubidea. Hori guztia jasotzen du. Eta hori guztia hemen hainbat aldiz esango baldin bazaigu ere ez dela batere garrantzitsua, da ezinbestekoa, zuk ongi dakizun bezala –eta, bestela, engainatu egiten gaituzu–, indarrean jarri behar ditugun politika publiko guztiak benetan jarri ahal izateko; bestela, ezingo ditugulako jarri. Hori ezinbestekoa da.

Eta nik errenuntzia esaten dudanean da uko egin diozulako baita gai horri buruz hitz egiteari ere. Gero esango omen duzu gehiago, baina badaukagu akordio bat, akordio handi bat, akordio handi bat. Besterik da beste pertsona batzuek zer eragin duten, beste alderdi batzuek zer eragin duten, eta eragin horretan k onartzen duen edo ez duen onartzen beste batzuek aipatzen diguten, oso argi aipatu diguten, hori guztia.

Nik nire hautagaitza aurkeztu dut, Egibar jauna, Euzko Alderdi Jeltzaleko jaun-andreok eta Ganberako legebiltzarkide guztiok, iruditzen zaidalako herri honen alternatiba garela, herri honetan gauzak beste era batera egiteko jende gehiago, eta gero eta gehiago, biltzen ari dela, bai ra, baina baita proiektu independentista nazional batera ere. Eta horren lekuko dira, bai Ipar Euskal Herrian, eta baita Nafarroan ere, izandako emaitzak. Eta uste dut… Eta lehen aipatu dudan hitza berriro ekarriko dut hona trantsizioa;

Horrexegatik aurkeztu dut nik nire hautagaitza, iruditzen zaidalako badirela kontu asko errotik… –errotik esaten dudanean ez erradikalki eta korrika bi egunetan, eta horregatik errepikatu dut trantsizio hitza– baina errotik aldatu behar ditugunak. Eta errotik aldatu behar ditugu trantsizio energetikoan eman behar ditugun urratsak, eta errotik aldatu behar ditugu feminismoan eman beharreko urratsak… Dudarik ez dela, hau guztiau esaten dudanean, lehenik eta behin, hamaika mila aldiz pandemia honetan esan dudan ikuspuntu batetik, ikuspegi bikoitzaz: ikuspegi bikoitzaz unean dauzkagun arazoei erantzuna emanez, eta herri bezala estrategikoki hartu behar ditugun neurriei erantzuna emateko, erantzunak adosteko eta erantzunak harilkatzeko gaitasuna izateko.

Eta horregatik esan dut herri honek denbora oso zailetan eta egoera oso zailetan jakin duela ateratzen, altxatzen eta aurrera egiten, eta hori normalean izan da kolektiboki indar handia erakutsi duelako. Eta indar kolektibo horretan egongo da. Ez alderdien indar kolektiboan bakarrik, baita horretan ere, baina beste eragile batzuen indar kolektiboan ere bai. Eta, zentzu horretan, niri iruditzen zait sindikatuen gehiengoarekin ez ahalegin berezia egitea eta nola edo hala erakartzea edo herri honek daukan sare asoziatiboarekin ez lan gehiago egitea, ba, akats bat dela, eta, gainera, gauzak hasiak direla Europan aldatzen zentzu horretan eta beste era batera lan egiteko moduak aurkitu behar ditugula.

Herritarrak zentroan baldin badaude, herritarren beharrei erantzuteko baldin bagaude, momentu honetan Osakidetzak dituen gabezia estrukturalak gainditzeko baldin bagaude, hezkuntzak dituenak gainditzeko baldin bagaude, zaintzak dituenak gainditzeko baldin bagaude, badauzkagu proposamenak, badauzkazue gure proposamenak eta egongo gara akordioan. Akordioa titular bat baldin bada, ba orduan, agian, ez gara egongo. Baina ni saiatuko naiz eta gure taldea saiatuko da, herri honen mesederako izango delakoan, titularretik haratago egoten, hain zuzen ere, akordio horietan. Ez dakit dena esan dizudan, bestela esango dizut gero.

Gorrotxategi andrea, harritu naute pare bat gauzek. Esan duzu hautagaitza babesteko…, ez duzuela babestuko "porque no integró a las izquierdas vascas". Bueno, ba, Mendia andreari esan beharko diozu, agian, zergatik ez duen integratu nahi "entre las izquierdas vascas". Ze, bueno, ni hemen nago prest akordioak egiteko. Egibar jaunari esan diodan gauza bera, e, akordioek izan beharko dute ez ezkerrekoak direlako edo dena delakoak direlako, izan beharko dute edukietan oinarritutakoak.

Eta, gero, bueno, ba, esango nizuke, baita ere, harritu egiten nauela pixka bat "integrar las izquierdas vascas" horrek… Esplikatuko didazu zein izan den Elkarrekin Podemosek legealdia hasi orduko eman duen lehen urratsa Parlamentu honetan. Eta hori esplikatuta, ba, agian, gauzak argiago geratuko zaizkigu.

"Y el pacto con el PSE, es más de lo mismo". Hombre, no olvide que están en el Gobierno de España, señora Gorrotxategi. Están en el Gobierno de España, y junto con el Partido Nacionalista Vasco en Nafarroa.

Edozein kasutan, Gorrotxategi andrea, zuk esan dituzun gauzak kontuan hartuta, nik uste dut baietz, badagoela elkarlanerako tarte handi bat, eta gauza askotan adostu genezakeela eta adostasunak aurkitu genitzakeela, bai zuekin, bai Alderdi Sozialistarekin; eta nik ez dut inolaz ere baztertzen beste taldeekin ere beste horrenbeste egitea. Baina errepikatuko dut: beti izango da edukietan oinarrituta, edukietatik aparte titularretan oinarritzeak ez duelako batere balio, eta, gainera, normalean frustrazioa sortzen duelako. Frustrazioa gugan, frustrazioa gugan etorkizunean egin ditzakegun akordio berriak egiteko, eta frustrazioa –eta hau da inportanteena– herritarrengan ere. Eta hori uste dut ekidin beharreko gauza bat dela.

Ezkerretik, eta herritarrei hitza emateko, ba, nik eskatuko nizuke ezker-ikuspegi horri ere mantentzea, ezta?, are gehiago bere burua plurinazionaltzat duen alderdi batetik. Eskubideak, Gorrotxategi andrea, ezin dira zatitu. Eta zailtasun handiak izango ditugu zuk gaur hona ekarri dituzun eta nik gaur hona ekarri ditudan hainbat neurri egikaritu ahal izateko, hain zuzen ere eskubide horiek zatituta baldin badaude eta Espainiari baimena eskatu behar baldin badiogu. Orduan, herritarrei hori ere argi esan behar zaie; baina, batez ere, saiatu behar duguna da herri honek beste estatus bat izan dezan.

Eta hau esango dizut zuri eta Egibar jaunari eta Ganberako beste kide guztiei ere. Nik uste dut k, zentzu horretan, guk, Euskal Errepublika independente baten aldarrikapena egiten dugunok, planteatu genuenean gure autonomiatik subiranotasunera plan hau, Egibar jauna, uste dut guk ere errenuntzia batzuk egiten genituela plan horretan, eta akordiorako ere errenuntzia batzuk egin genituela. Baina sustraiko gauza batzuk badaudela Espainiako Estatuarekin beste harreman bat izateko, benetan egia baldin bada herri honetako gizon-emakumeak zaindu nahi ditugula. Ze, bestea ere esan genezake, baina erremintak falta zaizkigu, eta eskean ibili behar dugu sarri askotan, sarri askotan. Eta guk proposatzen duguna da hitzarmen bat, badituena baldintza horiek guztiak eta herritarrei hitza eta erabakia emango diena.

Mendia andrea, esan didazu oposizioari begiratzeko, ba, zuk ere begiratu iezaiezu ezkerreko taldeei eta ikusiko duzu beste aukera batzuk bazeudela, baina zuek aukera jakin bat egin duzuela; eta oso zilegia da, e, zilegia da, dudarik ez dela. Baina esan nahi dizut ezkerra ere oso plurala dela, hemen geundela eta ez dela egon momentu bakar bat ere ez hauteskunde-kanpaina aurretik, hauteskunde kanpainan bertan, hauteskunde-kanpaina ostean, beste ezertarako; izatez, hainbeste akordio nahi dituen Egibar jaunari ere esango nioke gu deituak ere ez garela izan, hain zuzen ere, hitz egitera hauteskunde-emaitzez, geneukan panoramari buruz; interlokutore bakarrak Alderdi Sozialistako ordezkariak izan zarete. Eta zuk ere bazeneukan beste aukera batzuk egiteko posibilitatea.

Gobernu indartsu bat esaten duzu; espero dut oraingoa izango dela. Ze sarri askotan aurretik ikusi izan ditugu bi Gobernu hemen, eta ez Gobernu bakar bat. Eta orain diozu Gobernu indartsu bat izango dela y que es hora de arremangarse. Pues, muy bien, señora Mendia, pero yo llevaba un rato arremangada. Que yo creo que estar en política y entrar en política, sabe usted muy bien que implica arremangarse desde el primer día. Yo creo que todas las personas de este país, las que trabajan en diferentes aspectos, están todas arremangadas, ahora en época de COVID y siempre, cuando desarrollan profesionalmente una tarea también –con las excepciones consabidas, eta abar, eta abar–. Pero, desde luego, arremangadas estamos, y si quiere saber cómo estoy yo, ya me ve que estoy arremangada.

Eta akordioak egiteko, akordioak egiteko esan dudan baldintza horietan, Mendia andrea. Ze, esan dudan bezala, hitzak hitzak dira, baina hitz horien azpian edukiak behar ditugu; eta edukiak egon daitezke norabide batean –zuk oso ongi dakizu–, edo beste norabidean. Eta zure alderdiak sozialista

Nik errepikatzen dudana da guk inor bazterrean utzi gabe eta bideorri zehatz bat eginez akordatzeko aukera izango dugula, baina zuk esan didazu nik ez daukadala bide-orririk. Eta uste dut hori gehiago esan duzula, bueno, ba, gaur hori esatea tokatzen zitzaizuelako, ze nik uste dut bide-orri argi bat jarri dudala hemen mahai gainean; batzuei ahaztu zaie industriaz hitz egin dudala, beste batzuei ahaztu zaie... Agian, ez da batzuen gustukoa izango, baina nik uste dut dela bide-orri argi bat, eta aipatu ditudala, gainera, bide-orri hori aurrera ateratzeko zer baliabide behar ditugun, fiskalitatearen aldaketa behar dela, Egibar jauna hain konbentzituta, baina behar da, eta uste dut zuk ere hori badakizula. Eta mahai gainera ekarri ditut, tartean-tartean, orain baliatu genitzakeen finantzazio-modu batzuk eta etorkizunean gainean egon daitezkeen beste batzuk ere. Horretarako, edozein kasutan, Mendia andreak esango dizu badirela bete beharreko hitzak. Eta ez da posible esatea, bai, lege… Lan Erreformaren Legea derogatuko dugu, eta gero handik ordu batzuetara ezetz esan eta baietz esan eta dena delakoa esatea… Garrantzitsua da hartzen diren akordioak eta egiten diren akordioak betetzea eta konplitzea ere, iruditzen zaidalako herri honetako milaka eta milaka gizon-emakumek eta Espainiako Estatuko milaka eta milaka gizon-emakumek behin eta berriro eskatu dutela erreforma hori, zuek lehenengo bai esan eta gero ezetz esan zenutelako.

Mendia andrea, azkeneko kontu bat zurekin, hain zuzen ere, bueno, argi utzi duzulako ez zarela –nola esan didazu–, ez duzula Euskal Errepublikaren alde lan egingo. Ez nau harritu, ez nau harritu; ez nau inondik inora harritu hori esateak. Nik bai, Euskal Errepublika independente baten alde lan egingo dut. Nik eskatzen dudan bakarra da hemen gauden guztiok, hemen bizi garen herritar guztiok, aukera-berdintasuna izatea gure etorkizuna erabakitzeko. Eta iruditzen zait demokrazia sano batean hori oinarri-oinarrizkoa dela. Eta, gainera, iruditzen zait demokrazia ez dela momentu bat; ez da momentu batean sortzen den gauza bat. Eta ez naiz hasiko orain hitz egiten Espainiakoa nola sartu zen eta dagoen pototxoaz, eta daukazuen pototxoaz. Baina iruditzen zait demokrazia ez dela momentu bat, demokrazia dela prozesu bat. Ba, eta prozesu horretan demokraziak jakin behar duela hazten eta jakin behar duela erantzuten unean-unean herritarrek eskatzen dutenari.

Eta hori uste dut printzipio demokratiko oso onargarri bat dela. Eta oso onargarri bat da eta oso onartua, gainera, Europako gure inguruko herrialdeetan. Eskoziak egin zuen galdeketa bat; egin zuen erreferendum bat, galdetu zuen, berriro galdetuko du eta iragarri dute. Eta hurrengo egunean, ez dakit eguzkia atera zen, euritsu samarra delako zonaldea, baina ez zen ezer gertatu, eta ez zitzaion inori ezer gertatu. Eta, era berean, bertako herritarrek sentitu zuten, dudarik ez dela, ba, bueno, beren hitzak eta erabakiak zerbaiterako balio zuela, ze zentzu horretan ere uste dut demokraziak eraldatu beharra daukala, herritarrek daukaten protagonismoarekiko eta gizartean daukaten protagonismoarekiko. Ezin dugula jarraitu aurreko mendeetan bezala.

Esaten dizuedan bezala, nik errotik –eta ez erradikalki– aldaketak ekarri nahi ditut herri honetara, iruditzen zaidalako beharrezkoak direla eta praktikan jarri behar direla. Eta egin dut lehen marrazketa bat zeintzuk ziren garrantzitsuak, eta ez dizkizuet orain berriro errepikatuko.

Nire familiaz hitz egin nahi dut. Nire familia da mundu honetan xenofobiaren kontra eta arrazismoaren kontra borrokatzen diren milaka eta milaka gizon-emakumeen familia. Nire familia da Euskal Herrian eta mundu honetan faxismoaren kontra borrokatu diren eta borrokatzen diren milaka eta milaka gizon-emakumeen familia.

Horregatik, gure amonengatik, gure aitonengatik, gure ama eta aitengatik, guregatik eta gure seme-alabengatik, errepikatu nahi dut hori dela nire familia. Eta gurea askatasuna dela. (Txaloak).

Eskerrik asko, Iriarte anderea. Erantzuteko ere, Urkullu Renteria jaunak dauka hitza; lehendakari jauna, nahi duzunean.

text_en:
Thank you.

We've also been making abstition for the following reasons.

We have not voted for this legal proposition, because our views on tax policy and the state of attorneys do not accord with the final tax-rolls, and from this point of view we do not agree.

We don't think this is the way to solve the situation of the sector, and we think this finer rate is just a joke. And it's a dangerous spot because we know that the main telecommunication companies, when setting interconnect, take advantage of their superiority in the market. Phone operators have been punished several times, but they prefer to pay fines to their gain, and continue to impose the highest rates in Europe and the world.

Hence it is plain, that if this rate be applied, they will at last pay, because they will not diminish their gains. This would cost all users to increase access to the Internet. Moreover, the rate is proposed to apply in general, although many users do not download illegally.

And we don't have to protect EH Collect, and we think it's not the way. More means of dealing with the serious situation of the sector, that's clear. And that's political choice. And you, PSE, who propose this enterprise, have agreed to the budget, and you will agree with this government, and we will see if the bet for the sector really is firm or not.

And it is not difficult, if you like, to assign more resources. To get more incomes, let's go deep in the tax-form, so that public sector has more resources, and in budgets can take a certain amount of money to the sector.

But to this we must again declare that we have the necessary intervention of all taxes, that we need more tools than those of our present time, as we know that we are limited by the mere management of just taxes. And unfortunately, some of you are not on the way to transcend these limits, together with the EAJ and the PSE and the .

If we had a U.S.A. system, we could help with the serious sectors of our town more efficiently, in this case of visual presence.

In all this, we can't build our tax-based system in this way, by means of the final taxes. For, by this means, we may put a great deal of money one after another (e.g. in sugar, fat, and salt) on food, which are rich, and put away such as are wholesome, or a tax round the great surface to produce in small trade. These, to give you some examples.

On the other hand, we're doing a fair review to Vicente Reyes. First of all, because of the way he proposed this proposal. Because with the sector operators there has been no serious preliminary, we believe, and with the rest of the teams, at least with us, because you haven't done any work at all. You didn't find an agreement. In short, you haven't taken care of the minimum forms.

And, on the other hand, we see a big hole in your legal proposition. You're based on Catalan law, but a strong leg of that law, that's the article 18th. (Acceso de accesus lingiticus, which seeks protection by catault production, disappears in your proposal.) And you don't make any mention of euca production.

And finally, we want to direct the clear message to EAJ, and so we have done before this discussion. We haven't settled in favor of this legal proposition, just for the purpose of protecting the sector and making a great exception to our principles, but we haven't done it because we prefer the real commitments to the sector.

And this is what we now ask of EAJ: from this day forward he will commit seriously to the sector, from one to the budget for culture suspects, and the second to the receivers. And we want to sit here and talk to you about this, considering that we have the key in this enterprise, with EH Collect, the key.

So we've been waiting for a call from the government since Tuesday. According to what the Representative of the EAJ said... You have spoken of a more stable funding and other measures, and we would like to discuss all this with EAJ and the Government in this case. So, as I said, we wait for the call because it's invited.

And for the end, there's only another proposal to the government. We ask him to look at the Catalan model. On the one hand, ICEC High School, which gives access to the cultural profession, and on the other, to the Central High School of the Films and Views, which is apublic, and finally to promote the sector of visuals and protect catalan productions from the Law of 2010.

And that's all.
text:
Eskerrik asko.

Guk ere abstentziora jo dugu ondorengo arrazoiengatik.

Sektorearen egoera larriaren irakurketarekin guztiz bat etorrita ere, ez dugu lege-proposamen honen alde bozkatu, zerga-politikaz eta fiskalitate-sistemaz dugun ikuspegiarekin bat ez datorrelako eta, ildo horretatik, ez gatozelako bat zerga finalistekin.

Gure ustez, hau ez da sektorearen egoera konpontzeko bidea, eta tasa finalista hau partxe bat baino ez dela iruditzen zaigu. Eta partxe arriskutsua, gainera, badakigulako telekomunikazio-enpresa nagusienak, interkonexio-tarifak ezartzerakoan, merkatuan duten nagusitasunaz baliatzen direla. Telefonia-operadoreak prezioak ipintzeagatik behin baino gehiagotan izan dira zigortuak, baina dituzten irabaziekin nahiago dute isuna ordaindu eta erabiltzaileei Europan eta mundu mailan dauden tarifa altuenak inposatzen jarraitu.

Horregatik, edozein modutan jantzita ere, argi dugu tasa hau aplikatuz gero zeintzuek ordainduko duten azkenean, enpresek beraien irabaziak ez dituztelako murriztuko. Honek erabiltzaile guztien Interneterako sarbidea garestitzea ekarriko luke. Gainera, tasa modu orokorrean aplikatzea proposatzen da, nahiz eta erabiltzaile askok ez dugun modu ilegalean deskargarik egiten.

Eta n ez dugu hori babestuko, eta, gainera, uste dugu ez dela bidea. Sektoreak bizi duen egoera larriari aurre egiteko bitarteko gehiago bideratu behar dira, hori argi dago. Eta hori hautu politikoa da. Eta zuek, PSEk, ekimen honen proposatzaileek, aurrekontuak adostu dituzue eta adostuko dituzue Gobernu honekin, eta hor ikusi dugu eta ikusiko dugu benetan sektorearen aldeko apustua irmoa den ala ez.

Eta ez da zaila, hala nahi izanez gero, baliabide gehiago esleitzea. Diru-sarrera gehiago lortzeko, sakondu dezagun zerga-erreforman, sektore publikoak baliabide gehiago izateko eta aurrekontuetan diru kopuru bat sektoreari bideratu ahal izateko.

Baina horretarako, gaur berriz ere aldarrikatu behar dugu zerga guztien eskuduntza beharrezkoa dugula, beharrezkoak ditugula egungoak baino tresna gehiago, sistema integral eta orekatua izateko, badakigulako zerga zuzenen kudeaketa soilak mugatzen gaituela. Eta, zoritxarrez, batzuek ez zaudete muga horiek gainditzeko bidean, EAJ hain zuzen, PSE eta bidelagunekin batera.

Sistema fiskal integrala izanez gero, gure herrian larri dauden sektoreei modu eraginkorragoan laguntzea posible izango genuke, ikus-entzunezkoari kasu honetan.

Hau guztia esanda, ezin dugu gure politika fiskaleko sistema integrala bide horretatik eraiki, zerga finalisten bitartez, beraz. Ze, bide hori hartuta, tasa asko ezarri genitzake bata bestearen atzetik (esaterako, azukreetan, gantz aseetan edota gatzean aberatsak diren elikagaiei) eta, ordea, osasungarriak direnei kenkariak ezarri; edota azalera handien inguruko zerga bat, komertzio txikian eragiteko. Horiek, adibide batzuk jartzearren.

Bestalde, kritika zuzena egiten diogu Vicente Reyesi. Batetik, proposamen hau aurkeztu duen moduagatik. Sektoreko eragileekin ez delako aurrelanketa seriorik egin, gure ustez, eta gainerako taldeokin, gurekin behintzat, ez duzulako inolako lanketarik egin. Ez duzu adostasunik bilatu. Labur esanda, ez dituzu gutxieneko formak zaindu.

Eta, bestetik, zure lege-proposamenari zulo galanta ikusten diogu. Lege katalana hartzen duzu oinarri, baina lege horrek daukan hanka sendo bat, 18. artikulua hain zuzen ( garantía de acceso lingüístico ri buruzkoa), katalanezko produkzioak babestea bilatzen duena, zure proposamenean desagertu egiten da. Eta ez diozu euskarazko produkzioari inolako aipamenik ere egiten.

Eta, azkenik, mezu garbia zuzendu nahi diogu EAJri, eta halaxe egin dugu eztabaida honen aurretik ere. Gutxigatik ez gara kokatu lege-proposamen honen alde, sektorea babesteko helburu soilaz eta gure printzipioetan salbuespen handia eginez, baina ez dugu egin, sektorearekiko benetako konpromisoen bidea hobetsi dugulako.

Eta horixe da gaur atril honetatik EAJri eskatzen dioguna: gaurtik bertatik konpromiso serioa har dezala sektorearekiko, batetik kultura-sustapenerako aurrekontuan, eta bigarrenik kenkarietan. Eta zuekin eseri nahi dugu honetaz hitz egiteko, kontuan hartuta, gainera, ekimen honetan guk dugula, k duela, giltza.

Honenbestez, Gobernuaren deiaren zain gaude asteartetik. EAJko ordezkariak esandakoaren arabera… Finantziazio egonkorragoaz hitz egin duzu eta beste neurri batzuk ere aipatu dituzu, eta horretaz guztiaz hitz egin nahi genuke EAJrekin eta Gobernuarekin, kasu honetan. Beraz, esan bezala, deiaren zain geratzen gara, gonbita eginda dagoelako.

Eta amaitzeko, bakarrik beste proposamen bat Gobernuari. Eskatzen diogu Kataluniaren ereduari begiratu diezaiola. Batetik, kultura-sektoreari babes integrala ematen dion ICEC institutu publikoari; bestetik, Zinema eta Ikus-entzunezkoen Goi Mailako Eskola Publikoari (publikoa dena), eta azkenik, ikus-entzunezkoen sektorea sustatzeko eta katalanezko produkzioak babesteko 2010eko Zinearen Legeari.

Eta besterik ez.
